definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
see 食之無味，棄之可惜|食之无味，弃之可惜[shi2 zhi1 wu2 wei4 , qi4 zhi1 ke3 xi1]
pinyin: shi2 zhi1 wu2 wei4 , qi4 zhi1 bu4 gan1

definition: lit. to be hardly worth eating, but it would still be a pity to discard it (idiom)/fig. some things have little to no value, yet one is still reluctant to part with them
pinyin: shi2 zhi1 wu2 wei4 , qi4 zhi1 ke3 xi1

sentences.english: If you lack courage in love, your life will be colorless.
sentences.chinese: 一個在愛情中缺乏勇氣的人，生活也會平淡無味。

sentences.english: The noodle they served was cold and tasteless.
sentences.chinese: 他們供應的麪食冷而無味。

sentences.english: The office seems so dull and prosaic after Pine Ridge.
sentences.chinese: 從松嶺回來後，辦公室似乎變得枯燥無味了。

sentences.english: Talking with them are tedious so I can't help shaking head and sighing.
sentences.chinese: 跟這些人談話真是索然無味，因此才搖頭嘆息。

sentences.english: A mixture of milk and water is a insipid drink.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶和水的混合物是平淡無味的飲料。

sentences.english: Every day without you like a book without pages.
sentences.chinese: 沒有你的日子就像一本沒有書頁的書，勃然無味。

sentences.english: This is my vacation , nothing interesting.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我的假期，平淡無味。

sentences.english: The competition would have been cut and dried 10 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 若在10年前，競爭會顯得淡而無味。

sentences.english: Some things are fun the first time you do them------ and then not so much the next.
sentences.chinese: 有些事情第一次做興致昂然，之後再做就索然無味了。

sentences.english: Because this is not only some tasteless words.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這不只是一些無味的字。

sentences.english: Mouth insipidity, the stomach is a bit acerbity, be how to return a responsibility?
sentences.chinese: 嘴巴無味，胃有點酸，是怎麼回事啊？

sentences.english: After tasting them, all food here seems insipid.
sentences.chinese: 我嚐了以後，再喫這邊的水果，簡直無味極了。

sentences.english: Descriptive ecology is a dry subject .
sentences.chinese: 描述性的生態學是乾燥無味的課題。

sentences.english: The usual theism is more insipid.
sentences.chinese: 平常的有神論則更淡而無味了。

sentences.english: Let tasteless chicken ribs how to make change Xiangla filled clubs operating flavor?
sentences.chinese: 讓無味雞肋變香辣雞翅會所經營如何做出味道？

sentences.english: Straight life insipid, flavors and taste of life twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 平直的生活淡而無味，曲折的生活五味俱全。

definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
